_sText:
Dr. R Cade has kidnapped the famous arcade machines of history, distorting their levels for his own pleasure and gain. Enter his world and save the arcade machines from their cruel fate.

surf_arcade is my submission for the Fall 2020 KSF Mapping Contest. The map sees the player surf through a variety of retro arcade-style environments each with their own unique surfing style. The map is my take on the theme of "adventure" and is my fifth full-release project for surf. The map is tier 2 with plenty of skips as well as a bonus. A big thanks to the judges and the KSF owners for putting this contest together, as well as the KSF community for contributing to the generous prize pool. I hope you enjoy the map as much as i enjoyed making it :)

3500 maxvel, tier 2
